actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter II of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels III, IV, and I of the Executive Schedule, and for certain other positions being paid at rates equal to the rates for such levels.

summary.text: Increases the rates of pay for levels III, IV, and V of the Executive Schedule, for enumerated positions covered by the Federal Salary Act, and for specified federal judges being paid at rates equal to the rates for such levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter II of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels III, IV, and I of the Executive Schedule, and for certain other positions being paid at rates equal to the rates for such levels.
